AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Usage: [p]xkcd or [p]xkcd latest to get the most recent comic
                     Usage: [p]xkcd random to get a random comic
                     Usage: [p]xkcd [number] to get a specific comic

                     Grabs a comic from http://xkcd.com/.
NAME: Grabs XKCD comics
